    • Constructor Detail

      • Animation

        public Animation(java.util.List<processing.core.PImage> frames,
                 int frameCount,
                 int frameDuration,
                 Direction direction)
        Constructor for all animation objects
        Parameters:
        frames - list containing all images to be used in the frames, in the order they are to be played
        frameCount - the number of frames in the animation (Deprecated)
        frameDuration - the length in milliseconds for each frame to be played
        direction - the direction associated with the animation.

      • Animation

        public Animation(java.util.List<processing.core.PImage> frames,
                 int frameCount,
                 int frameDuration)
        Parameters:
        frames - the list of PImages that form the frames of the animation
        frameCount - the number of frames for the aniamtion
        frameDuration - the duration in milliseconds for each frame to be played Constructor for gameobjects with no directional attribute
